page.title: 11A Popular Children's Story
page.content: James and the Giant Peach is a popular story.Here is what happens:James is a happy young boy living with his mum by the sea.One day his mum and dad were eaten by a rhinoceros in Oxford Street. James is sent to live with Spiker and Sponge his two awful aunts.When he arrives magical things happen,James and some insects have an adventure inside a Giant Peach!They travel across the Atlantic Ocean and are attacked by sharks and cloudmen! They arrive in AMERICA and become famous.ROALD DAHL wrote this story; he also wrote some other stories for children:George's Marvellous Medicine, The Twits,Witches,Danny the Champion of the World and many more.
